#### Optimization Tips, Tricks and Resourses:


* https://www.udacity.com/course/ud110
* https://www.udacity.com/course/ud989
* Knockout JS - http://knockoutjs.com/
* Google Maps API Documentation - https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/
* Open Weather API Documentation - http://openweathermap.org/
* Bootstrap CSS Implementation -http://getbootstrap.com/
* Color Theme Implementation -http://bootswatch.com/
* http://www.jslint.com/
* https://validator.w3.org/#validate_by_input
* jigsaw.w3.org/css-validator/#validate_by_input
* westciv.com/tools/manifestR/
* http://www.html5rocks.com/en/tutorials/appcache/beginner/
* http://www.w3.org/TR/2011/WD-html5-20110525/offline.html
* gruntjs.com/
* ngrok.com/
* http://usejsdoc.org/
* Stackoverflow
* Chrome Developer Tools
